verses.text: Moreover the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* thee a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w roll|strong="H1549"\w*, and \w write|strong="H3789"\w* in it with a \w man’s|strong="H0582"\w* \w pen|strong="H2747"\w* concerning \w Maher-shalal-hash-baz|strong="H4122"\w*.\f + \fr 8.1 \ft Maher-shalal-hash-baz: Heb. In making speed to the spoil he hasteneth the prey, or, Make speed, etc\f*

And I \w took|strong="H5749"\w* unto me \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* to \w record|strong="H5749"\w*, \w Uriah|strong="H0223"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeberechiah|strong="H3000"\w*.

And I \w went|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \w prophetess|strong="H5031"\w*; and she \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*, and \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to me, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Maher-shalal-hash-baz|strong="H4122"\w*.\f + \fr 8.3 \ft went: Heb. approached\f*

For before the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* shall have \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* to \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*, My \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and my \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, the \w riches|strong="H2428"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w* and the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* shall be taken \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.\f + \fr 8.4 \ft the riches…: or, he that is before the king of Assyria shall take away the riches, etc\f*
¶ The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* also unto me \w again|strong="H3254"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Forasmuch|strong="H3282"\w* as this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w refuseth|strong="H3988"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Shiloah|strong="H7975"\w* that \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w softly|strong="H0328"\w*, and \w rejoice|strong="H4885"\w* in \w Rezin|strong="H7526"\w* and \w Remaliah’s|strong="H7425"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*;

Now therefore, behold, the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* bringeth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* upon them the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, \w strong|strong="H6099"\w* and \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, \add even\add* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and all his \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*: and he shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* over all his \w channels|strong="H0650"\w*, and go \w over|strong="H1980"\w* all his \w banks|strong="H1415"\w*:

And he shall \w pass|strong="H2498"\w* through \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; he shall \w overflow|strong="H7857"\w* and go \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, he shall \w reach|strong="H5060"\w* \add even\add* to the \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*; and the stretching \w out|strong="H4298"\w* of his \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* shall \w fill|strong="H4393"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, O \w Immanuel|strong="H6005"\w*.\f + \fr 8.8 \ft stretching…: Heb. fulness of the breadth of thy land shall be the stretchings out of his wings\f*

¶ \w Associate|strong="H7489"\w* yourselves, O ye \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and ye shall be broken in \w pieces|strong="H2865"\w*; and give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* ye of \w far|strong="H4801"\w* \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*: \w gird|strong="H0247"\w* yourselves, and ye shall be broken in \w pieces|strong="H2865"\w*; \w gird|strong="H0247"\w* yourselves, and ye shall be broken in \w pieces|strong="H2865"\w*.\f + \fr 8.9 \ft people, and: or, people, yet\f*

\w Take|strong="H5779"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w together|strong="H5779"\w*, and it shall come to \w nought|strong="H6565"\w*; \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, and it shall not \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*: for \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \add is\add* with us.

¶ For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* thus to me with a \w strong|strong="H2393"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w instructed|strong="H3256"\w* me that I should not \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,\f + \fr 8.11 \ft with…: Heb. in strength of hand\f*

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* ye not, A \w confederacy|strong="H7195"\w*, to all \add them to\add* whom this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, A \w confederacy|strong="H7195"\w*; neither \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* ye their \w fear|strong="H4172"\w*, nor be \w afraid|strong="H6206"\w*.

\w Sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* himself; and \add let\add* him \add be\add* your \w fear|strong="H4172"\w*, and \add let\add* him \add be\add* your \w dread|strong="H6206"\w*.

And he shall be for a \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*; but for a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* of \w stumbling|strong="H5063"\w* and for a \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* of \w offence|strong="H4383"\w* to \w both|strong="H8147"\w* the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, for a \w gin|strong="H6341"\w* and for a \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* to the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And \w many|strong="H7227"\w* among them shall \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w*, and \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, and be \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, and be \w snared|strong="H3369"\w*, and be \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*.
Bind \w up|strong="H6887"\w* the \w testimony|strong="H8584"\w*, \w seal|strong="H2856"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* among my \w disciples|strong="H3928"\w*.

And I will \w wait|strong="H2442"\w* upon the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that \w hideth|strong="H5641"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and I will \w look|strong="H6960"\w* for him.

Behold, I and the \w children|strong="H3206"\w* whom the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me \add are\add* for \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* and for \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, which \w dwelleth|strong="H7931"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

¶ And when they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto you, \w Seek|strong="H1875"\w* unto them that have familiar \w spirits|strong="H0178"\w*, and unto \w wizards|strong="H3049"\w* that \w peep|strong="H6850"\w*, and that \w mutter|strong="H1897"\w*: should not a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* unto their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*? for the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* to the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*?

To the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* and to the \w testimony|strong="H8584"\w*: if they \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* not according to this \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \add it is\add* because \add there is\add* no \w light|strong="H7837"\w* in them.\f + \fr 8.20 \ft no…: Heb. no morning\f*

And they shall \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through it, hardly \w bestead|strong="H7185"\w* and \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*: and it shall come to pass, that when they shall be \w hungry|strong="H7456"\w*, they shall \w fret|strong="H7107"\w* themselves, and \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* their \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w look|strong="H6437"\w* \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*.

And they shall \w look|strong="H5027"\w* unto the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; and behold \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w* and \w darkness|strong="H2825"\w*, \w dimness|strong="H4588"\w* of \w anguish|strong="H6695"\w*; and \add they shall be\add* \w driven|strong="H5080"\w* to \w darkness|strong="H0653"\w*.
